column2: "Whenever we run one of these events, we always have an Attraction Corner! I've been working hard on this one."
"Attractions with lots of moving parts usually draw a crowd, but this time the venue's going to be too dark to see them."

"We need something that people can enjoy despite the darkness...
Hmm, any ideas?"
"Huh? We might be able to get some inspiration from an enemy? In that case, could you see what you can find? It would be so helpful!"
